On-Demand Full Gameshark:
      INSTRUCTIONS
 
You must add and activate both PART1 and PART2 of this Very Long Gameshark
 
IN PLAYER 2 CONTROLLER:
Hold A and a direction to Enable that part
Hold B and a direction to Disable that part
 
DIRETCTIONS (C-Buttons)
UP: Ears
LEFT: Glasses
RIGHT: Cape
DOWN: Tail
 
PART 1 (Enablers):
